title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
**Breathe Easier with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier – Your 1-Gallon Companion for Comfort!**

Transform your indoor space into an oasis of comfort with the sleek and efficient Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, designed to cater to areas up to 320 sq. ft. This 1-gallon capacity powerhouse in classic black is the perfect addition to your home or office, ensuring that you breathe easier day and night.

**Optimal Humidity at Your Fingertips**
Featuring a cool mist evaporative technology, this humidifier gently introduces moisture into your environment at a rate of 142 milliliters per hour. With three adjustable speed settings controlled by a simple mechanical knob, you have complete control over the humidity levels in your space.

**Smart Features for Effortless Use**
Never worry about running dry, thanks to the convenient low tank indicator that alerts you when it's time for a refill. What's more, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is designed with your convenience in mind – it's entirely dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.

**A Touch of Aromatherapy**
Elevate your experience with the integrated aroma tray that allows you to infuse your favorite essential oils into the mist, creating a soothing and personalized atmosphere that caters to your senses.

**Safety and Durability Combined**
Engineered with an empty tank protection feature, this humidifier ensures safety by automatically shutting off when the water runs out. Plus, it's compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, guaranteeing long-lasting performance and pure, clean mist.

**Sleek and Portable Design**
Weighing just 6.33 lbs, this stylish black humidifier is a portable and contemporary addition to any room. It's built to blend seamlessly with your decor while providing the ultimate in climate control.

**Invest in Your Health and Comfort**
Don't let dry air compromise your comfort or well-being. The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is an investment in a healthier lifestyle. Shop now and indulge in the serenity of perfect humidity levels and the enchanting aroma of your choice. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to a fresh, moisturized environment today!

**Breathe Easy with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier - Your Solution for Comfortable Living!**

Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, a sleek black addition to any room that not only ensures optimal humidity levels but also adds a touch of elegance to your home decor. Designed for ease of use and convenience, this humidifier is the perfect companion for creating a more comfortable and breathable environment in spaces up to 320 square feet.

**Key Features:**
- **Generous 1-Gallon Tank:** Say goodbye to constant refills! Our large tank capacity provides long-lasting mist, making sure your comfort is uninterrupted during those dry months.
- **Efficient Humidity Control:** With a humidity capacity of 142ml per hour, this humidifier effortlessly maintains the right moisture level, helping to alleviate dry skin, sinus issues, and other discomforts associated with dry air.
- **Aroma Tray for Added Bliss:** Enhance your experience with the added aroma tray, where you can add your favorite essential oils for a therapeutic and relaxing atmosphere.
- **Three Speed Settings:** Customize your comfort with 3 different speed settings, easily controlled by a simple mechanical knob. Tailor the mist output to your personal preference with ease.
- **Low Tank Indicator:** Never be caught off guard! The low tank indicator alerts you when it's time for a refill, ensuring continuous operation.
- **Dishwasher Safe:** Cleaning has never been easier. With dishwasher-safe components, maintenance is a breeze, allowing you more time to relax and enjoy the benefits of your humidifier.
- **Safe and Reliable:** With empty tank protection and compatibility with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, you can trust that your air stays clean and your device operates safely.
- **Evaporative Technology:** Immerse yourself in the benefits of cool mist evaporative technology, ideal for reducing static electricity and keeping your wooden furniture and floors in perfect condition.

Weighing just 6.33 lbs, this portable and stylish Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is an essential household item for anyone looking to improve their air quality and breathe better. Whether in your living room, bedroom, or office, enjoy the tranquility and health benefits today!

**Get the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier now and transform your living space into an oasis of freshness and comfort!**

Create a haven of soothing comfort in your space with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. This sleek black essential is a must-have for anyone seeking relief from dry air discomfort and looking to add a touch of serenity to their home or office.

**Breathe Easy with Cool Mist Technology**
Equipped with advanced cool mist evaporative technology, this humidifier efficiently disperses a fine vapor throughout your room, providing relief from dry air and creating a more comfortable environment. With a generous 1-gallon tank capacity, you can enjoy extended periods of humidification without constant refills.

**Customize Your Comfort**
Choose from three speed settings to achieve the perfect level of humidity using the simple mechanical knob control. Whether you prefer a subtle whisper of moisture or a more substantial mist, you have the power to tailor your air quality to your specific needs.

**Aromatherapy Ready**
Enhance your humidifying experience with the built-in aroma tray. Add your favorite essential oils to infuse your space with calming or invigorating scents, transforming any room into a tranquil oasis.

**Effortless Maintenance**
Designed with your convenience in mind, this Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier features a dishwasher-safe design, making clean-up a breeze. Plus, the low tank indicator ensures you'll never be caught off guard by an empty tank.

**Smart and Safe**
Never worry about leaving your humidifier on when the tank is empty. With empty tank protection, the unit automatically shuts off to prevent damage and ensure safety. Additionally, the humidifier is compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, ensuring your air stays clean and fresh.

**Perfect for Any Space**
With the capacity to cover an area of up to 320 sq. ft., this humidifier is versatile enough for bedrooms, living rooms, or any space where improved air quality is desired. Despite its power, it remains lightweight at just 6.33 lbs, allowing for effortless relocation.
